name: The Arts and Cultural Heritage Trust

address: Green Park Extension (Opposite Green Park Market)

briefDescription: The Arts and Cultural Heritage Trust has set up the Partition Museum at Amritsar, dedicated to the memory of the Partition of the sub-continent in 1947 â€” its victims, its survivors and its lasting legacy. The Partition Museum opened all its galleries to the public in August 2017. The Museum is working towards creating a comprehensive repository of all material relating to the Partition, including oral histories, official papers, personal documents, objects, literature etc.
